item.title: Thoughts on Programming
item.description: Over the past several years, I have developed a love-hate relationship with programming. A never-ending cycle of wanting to learn more, trying to write out some code, hitting walls, and giving up. I’m hoping this are finally starting to change, and I can develop some confidence as a software developer.
